words.englishMeaning: A round fruit with red or green skin and a whitish interior.
words.kashmiriMeaning: اَپَل پھَل چھَے جِس کی قِسمیں ہِندی یا سبز رنگ کی ہونَدی ہیں
words.urduMeaning: ایک گول پھل جس کی رنگت سرخ یا سبز ہو سکتی ہے اور اس کا اندر نرم ہوتا ہے
words.content: Apple is one of the most widely consumed fruits in the world.

words.englishMeaning: A domesticated carnivorous mammal with a bark.
words.kashmiriMeaning: کتا ایک گھریلو جاندار ہے جو بھونکتا ہے
words.content: Dogs are often kept as pets and can perform various tasks for humans.

words.englishMeaning: A large herbivorous mammal with a trunk, native to Africa and Asia.
words.content: Elephants are the largest land animals on Earth.
